title: The End. Amazing collection of film closing stills.
content:
A beautiful collection of Warner Brothers final scene type treatments, the majority hand drawn.

Mouse over for the film's title card: [http://tinyurl.com/yjj2y6a](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213431/http:/tinyurl.com/yjj2y6a "http://tinyurl.com/yjj2y6a")

Part of a massive collection of Film Title stills assembled by Dutch web designer Christian Annyas. Not the usual homage to film title sequences themselves, but of the moment when the film's title and hence it's type treatment is first revealed in the sequence.

Brilliant sleuthing, kudos to Christian.
author: TypographyShop

comments.content:
Thanks for posting. That's some seriously lovely lettering and so much in glorious monochrome. And also some great movie titles such as "Young Man with a Horn", "Dark Passage" and "The Amazing Dr Clitterhouse".

It would be good to see the same done for [Ealing Studios](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213431/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ealing_Studios).
